content: two short sides together turn work 90 degrees clockwise to join the short sides using single_crochet as foll row 4 *insert hook through 1 loop on the side of half_double_crochet in front + a turning chain in back yo draw up a loop yo pull yarn through both loops on the hook to finish 1 single_crochet* twice insert hook through a turning chain in front + under 1 loop on the side of double_crochet in back yo draw up a loop yo pull yarn trough both loops on the hook to finish 1 single_crochet three vmes repeat bet * twice more chain 1 turn 7 sts row 5 1 single_crochet into each single_crochet below chain 10 turn 7 sts row 6 1 slip_stitch into the last single_crochet below forming a loop chain 1 turn 12 single_crochet around the loop slip_stitch to join to the corner of the main body of the keychain chain 10 turn 1 puff st into the 1st chain from the hook add beads or charms to the end to personalize your keychain if you wish fasten_off and weave in all ends schema4c c urth yarns 2022 - pa\erns@urthyarns com - urthyarns com - ravelryid urthyarnscs 2
